verbs.description: decasualize (third-person singular simple present decasualizes, present participle decasualizing, simple past and past participle decasualized)

entries.meaning: (transitive, intransitive) To eliminate casual labour from.
examples: In some areas they have attempted to decasualize certain types of employment and to control street-trading by a local licensing system requiring juveniles to obtain their licences through the committees.
